name: CUBE³
description:
Slide avoid and win in this new action-packed indie-game, which will make you addicted.

Thanks to Brackeys and their tutorials for helping me put down the basics.

I have put quite a bit of time and effort into this so where possible, please pay $4.99, but as always, you can play the game for the low price of 0$ with no download required.

The game's basics are simple:

This is the first version I release, so any bugs, ideas or comments will be greatly appreciated.
